description: Single-document baseline test using Phase 2 validation document (digital PDF, no OCR required)

selection_rationale: Phase 2 baseline document - allows direct validation of LLM-as-judge against manual evaluation. Digital PDF (no OCR), well-tested, known baseline scores.

llm_judge_config.validation_notes: Automated LLM judge scores should align with Phase 2 manual evaluation: OpenAI/OpenRouter ~8-10/10, Anthropic ~9/10, LangExtract penalized for missing citations

purpose: Quick validation benchmark - single digital PDF to verify automated scoring matches Phase 2 manual evaluation
